languages.text: "Отныне они не нужны, ибо суть их впитало твое тело — сосуд, что станет вместилищем великой благости, или оружие, что сокрушит Предел. Истина вошла в самую твою кровь — отныне ты благословлен{mf||а} на то, чтобы узнать последнюю часть имени Предела рассвета. Когда придет час... ты обрящешь власть над ним".

"They are no longer necessary, for their essence has been absorbed by your body — a vessel to hold the great blessing, or a weapon that will crush the Edge of Daybreak. The truth is in your very blood now, and you are hereby blessed to discover the last part of the name of the Edge. When the time comes... you will gain power over it."
languages.original_text: "Отныне они не нужны, ибо суть их впитало твое тело — сосуд, что станет вместилищем великой благости, или оружие, что сокрушит Предел. Истина вошла в самую твою кровь — отныне ты благословлен{mf||а} на то, чтобы узнать последнюю часть имени Предела рассвета. Когда придет час... ты обрящешь власть над ним".

traits.locale_text: "From now on they are not necessary anymore, for their essence has been absorbed by your body, a vessel that will house the great blessing inside of it, or a weapon that will crush the Edge. The truth is in your very blood now, hereby you are blessed to discover the last part of the name of the Edge of Daybreak. When the time comes... you will gain power over it."

"From now on they are not necessary anymore, for their essence has been absorbed by your body, a vessel that will house the great blessing inside of it, or a weapon that will crush the Edge. The truth is in your very blood now, hereby you are blessed to discover the last part of the name of the Edge of Daybreak. When the time comes... you will gain power over it."

"They are no longer necessary, for their essence has been absorbed by your body — a vessel to hold the great blessing, or a weapon that will crush the Edge. The truth is in your very blood now, you are hereby blessed to discover the last part of the Edge of Daybreak. When the time comes... you will gain power over it."

"They are no longer necessary, for their essence has been absorbed by your body — a vessel to hold the great blessing, or a weapon that will crush the Edge. The truth is in your very blood now, you are hereby blessed to discover the last part of the Edge of Daybreak. When the time comes... you will gain power over it."

"They are no longer necessary, for their essence has been absorbed by your body — a vessel to hold the great blessing, or a weapon that will crush the Edge of Daybreak. The truth is in your very blood now, and you are hereby blessed to discover the last part of the name of the Edge. When the time comes... you will gain power over it."

languages.text: “那些碎片已经不重要了，因为你的身体已经吸收了它们的精华，成为了承载伟大祝福的容器，或是成为毁灭破晓锋刃的武器。真相此刻就在你的血脉之中，你已经得到了祝福，可以寻找破晓锋刃的最后一部分了。当时机成熟时……你将会获得驾驭它的力量。”
languages.original_text: "They are no longer necessary, for their essence has been absorbed by your body — a vessel to hold the great blessing, or a weapon that will crush the Edge of Daybreak. The truth is in your very blood now, and you are hereby blessed to discover the last part of the name of the Edge. When the time comes... you will gain power over it."

traits.locale_text: “那些碎片已经不重要了，因为你的身体已经吸收了它们的精华，成为了承载伟大祝福的容器，或是成为毁灭破晓锋刃的武器。真相此刻就在你的血脉之中，你已经得到了祝福，可以寻找破晓锋刃的最后一部分了。当时机成熟时……你将会获得驾驭它的力量。”

languages.text: « Ils ne sont plus nécessaires, car votre corps a absorbé leur essence, faisant de vous l'hôte d'une grande bénédiction ou une arme capable de détruire la Lame de l'Aube. La vérité réside désormais dans votre sang et vous avez reçu la faveur qui vous permettra de découvrir le dernier fragment du nom de la Lame. Quand le moment viendra... vous aurez le pouvoir de la contrôler. »
languages.original_text: "They are no longer necessary, for their essence has been absorbed by your body — a vessel to hold the great blessing, or a weapon that will crush the Edge of Daybreak. The truth is in your very blood now, and you are hereby blessed to discover the last part of the name of the Edge. When the time comes... you will gain power over it."

traits.locale_text: « Ils ne sont plus nécessaires, car votre corps a absorbé leur essence, faisant de vous l'hôte d'une grande bénédiction ou une arme capable de détruire la Lame de l'Aube. La vérité réside désormais dans votre sang et vous avez reçu la faveur qui vous permettra de découvrir le dernier fragment du nom de la Lame. Quand le moment viendra... vous aurez le pouvoir de la contrôler. »

languages.text: 「それらはもはや必要ない、なぜならその本質はお前の肉体…偉大なる加護を宿す器、暁の刃を砕く武器に吸収されたからだ。真実はお前の血そのものの中にあり、今や最後の刃の名を見出す祝福を受けた。時が来れば…お前はそれを支配する力を得るだろう」
languages.original_text: "They are no longer necessary, for their essence has been absorbed by your body — a vessel to hold the great blessing, or a weapon that will crush the Edge of Daybreak. The truth is in your very blood now, and you are hereby blessed to discover the last part of the name of the Edge. When the time comes... you will gain power over it."

traits.locale_text: 「それらはもはや必要ない、なぜならその本質はお前の肉体…偉大なる加護を宿す器、暁の刃を砕く武器に吸収されたからだ。真実はお前の血そのものの中にあり、今や最後の刃の名を見出す祝福を受けた。時が来れば…お前はそれを支配する力を得るだろう」

languages.text: «Ya no son necesarios, pues su esencia ha sido absorbida por tu cuerpo: un receptáculo que alojará la gran bendición o un arma que aplastará el Filo del Amanecer. La verdad ahora recorre tus venas y tu bendición te permitirá encontrar la última parte del nombre del Filo. Cuando llegue el momento... apodérate de él».
languages.original_text: "They are no longer necessary, for their essence has been absorbed by your body — a vessel to hold the great blessing, or a weapon that will crush the Edge of Daybreak. The truth is in your very blood now, and you are hereby blessed to discover the last part of the name of the Edge. When the time comes... you will gain power over it."

traits.locale_text: «Ya no son necesarios, pues su esencia ha sido absorbida por tu cuerpo: un receptáculo que alojará la gran bendición o un arma que aplastará el Filo del Amanecer. La verdad ahora recorre tus venas y tu bendición te permitirá encontrar la última parte del nombre del Filo. Cuando llegue el momento... apodérate de él».

languages.text: "Sie sind nicht mehr nötig, denn ihre Essenz wurde von Eurem Körper absorbiert – einem Gefäß, das den großen Segen empfangen kann, oder eine Waffe, die den Rand des Tageslichts vernichten wird. Die Wahrheit liegt nun in Eurem Blut und Ihr seid hiermit gesegnet, den letzten Teil des Namens des Randes zu entdecken. Wenn die Zeit kommt ... werdet Ihr Macht darüber erlangen."
languages.original_text: "They are no longer necessary, for their essence has been absorbed by your body — a vessel to hold the great blessing, or a weapon that will crush the Edge of Daybreak. The truth is in your very blood now, and you are hereby blessed to discover the last part of the name of the Edge. When the time comes... you will gain power over it."

Die Wahrheit liegt nun in Eurem Blut und Ihr seid hiermit gesegnet, den letzten Teil des Namens des Randes zu entdecken. Wenn die Zeit kommt ... werdet Ihr Macht darüber erlangen."

"Sie sind nicht mehr nötig, denn ihre Essenz wurde von Eurem Körper absorbiert — einem Gefäß, das den großen Segen empfangen kann, oder eine Waffe, die den Rand vernichten wird. Die Wahrheit liegt nun in Eurem Blut, Ihr seid hiermit gesegnet, den letzten Teil des Rands des Tagesanbruchs zu entdecken. Wenn die Zeit kommt ... werdet Ihr Macht darüber erlangen."

languages.text: "Artık yoklar. Özleri, ya büyük lütfun konağı ya da Tan Vakti'ni ezecek silah olacak vücudun tarafından emildi. Hakikat artık damarlarında akıyor. Yalım'ın adının son kısmını keşfetmekle kutsandın. Zamanı geldiğinde... Ona egemen olacak güce kadir olacaksın."
languages.original_text: "They are no longer necessary, for their essence has been absorbed by your body — a vessel to hold the great blessing, or a weapon that will crush the Edge of Daybreak. The truth is in your very blood now, and you are hereby blessed to discover the last part of the name of the Edge. When the time comes... you will gain power over it."
